mean_cn: v. 呼吸；  n. 瞬间；  adj. 逼真的
mean_en: the bodily process of inhalation and exhalation; the process of taking in oxygen from inhaled air and releasing carbon dioxide by exhalation
sentence: From the way she held her throat I could tell she was having trouble breathing.
sentence_trans: 从她捂住喉咙的方式，我能看出她呼吸有问题。
